duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the strategic development of investment themes and source opportunities aligned with the firm's strategy.
Conduct diligence and vetting of investment opportunities, overseeing due diligence for transactions.
Direct the preparation of reports and investment committee memorandums for the investment decision-making process.
Liaise with lawyers during the investment process and ensure comprehensive deal documentation.
Monitor portfolio positions and manage relationships with portfolio companies, gaining valuable operating experience.
Prepare investment marketing materials, attend fund raising meetings, and assist with sourcing and developing relationships with investors.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 6 years experience in investment banking, private equity and/or venture capital (MBA degree preferred)
